value.original: This property allows the user to set the character which will be used as field separator on generated CSV files. If it's not set, the comma will be used

row.value: This property allows the user to set the character which will be used as field separator on generated CSV files. If it's not set, the comma will be used

value.original: This property allows the user to set the decimal separator that will be used on the generated CSV files. If it is not set, the decimal separator defined in the Format.xml file will be used

row.value: This property allows the user to set the decimal separator that will be used on the generated CSV files. If it is not set, the decimal separator defined in the Format.xml file will be used

value.original: This property allows the user to configure the Text Encoding of the generated CSV files. Valid values are for example 'iso-8859-1', or 'UTF-8'

row.value: This property allows the user to configure the Text Encoding of the generated CSV files. Valid values are for example 'iso-8859-1', or 'UTF-8'
